UPDATE admin_user
login_name = #{loginName},
login_img = #{loginImg},
real_name = #{realName},
password = #{password},
email = #{email},
sex = #{sex},
mobile = #{mobile},
sign = #{sign},
age = #{age},
add_user = #{addUser},
add_time = #{addTime},
update_user = #{updateUser},
update_time = #{updateTime},

freeze_date = #{freezeDate},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
login_flag = #{loginFlag},
login_ip = #{loginIp},
login_date = #{loginDate},
remarks = #{remarks},
WHERE id = #{id}
